---

A _gravemist taper_ is a conical candle with symbols of terror and death carved into the wax. The taper can be used as a catalyst when casting a [_mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1606) spell, burning the taper away, coloring the mist gray, and filling the mist with ghastly, shadowy shapes. The flat check to overcome the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) state from the mist rises to 7, and a creature who fails such a check becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) 1. This aspect of the spell has the [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598), and [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) traits.
